author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Part of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31061. I encountered this class by pure chance when looking around in the static analyzer. Given that its constructor signature `LeptonVertexSignificance(const edm::EventSetup& iSetup, edm::ConsumesCollector&& iC)` can not have ever worked (`ConsumesCollector` argument was added in #1126) and that the class is not used anywhere in CMSSW, I decided to try to remove it.

#### PR validation:

None.
title: Remove LeptonVertexSignificance as obsolete
